/opt/cuda/bin/g++     CMakeFiles/ggnn.dir/main.cpp.o  -o ggnn  -Wl,-rpath,/home/cocoa/GAT/GPU-Computation:/opt/cuda/lib64:/home/cocoa/GAT/Matrix GPU-Computation/libCuMatrix.so /opt/cuda/lib64/libcublas.so /opt/cuda/lib64/libcudart_static.a -ldl /usr/lib/librt.so Matrix/libmatrix.so /usr/local/blas/OpenBLAS/lib/libopenblas.a /usr/local/blas/CBLAS/lib/cblas_LINUX.a -lpthread /usr/lib/libcudnn.so.7 /opt/cuda/lib64/libcusparse.so
